Title: Relates to establishing a procedure for the creation of new counties
Summary: Relates to establishing a procedure for the creation of new counties; requires a population as large as an assembly district and at least 250 square miles to create; requires a feasibility study to be prepared before a petition may be filed; establishes a petition process to become a county and requires a referendum be held; establishes process for disposition of property and assumption of debt.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the county law, in relation to establishing a procedure for the creation of new counties
